1. **Check online weather websites**: You can check websites like weather.com, accuweather.com, or wunderground.com for the latest weather forecast for your area. Simply enter your location or zip code to get the current conditions and forecast for Saturday and Sunday.
2. **Use a weather app**: Download a weather app on your smartphone, such as Dark Sky, Weather Underground, or The Weather Channel app. These apps provide current weather conditions and forecasts for your location.
3. **Check with local news or government websites**: Your local news station or government website may also provide weather forecasts and updates for your area.
4. **Use a bike-specific weather app**: There are several bike-specific weather apps, such as Bike Weather or Ride Weather, that provide weather forecasts and conditions specifically tailored for cyclists.

Remember to check the forecast regularly before your ride to ensure you're prepared for any conditions. Don't forget to pack accordingly, and stay safe on your ride!
